name: GetLandingPages
description:
Retrieve a list of HubSpot CMS landing pages.

This tool retrieves a list of landing pages from HubSpot CMS, supporting paging and filtering. Ideal for integrations that analyze page models and suggest edits.

parameters.name: created_at_timestamp
parameters.description: Return landing pages created at the specified exact timestamp. Format: ISO 8601.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Return landing pages created after this specified timestamp (ISO 8601 format).

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages created after the specified time.

parameters.name: created_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Only return landing pages created before the specified ISO 8601 timestamp.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages created before the specified time.

parameters.name: last_updated_exact_time
parameters.description: Return Landing Pages last updated at exactly this time. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_after_datetime
parameters.description: Return landing pages updated after this datetime in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: last_updated_before
parameters.description: Return landing pages updated before this specified datetime (ISO format).

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort_fields_for_results
parameters.description: Specifies fields for sorting results. Valid options: `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. Default is `createdAt`.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: cursor_after_token
parameters.description: The token to get the next set of results. Obtainable from `paging.next.after` in a paged response.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of landing pages to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: filter_by_property
parameters.description: Specify a property to filter the landing pages by.

parameters.name: include_archived_pages
parameters.description: Specify whether to include deleted landing pages in the results. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Landing Pages. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return Landing Pages created at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return Landing Pages created after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages created after the specified time.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return Landing Pages created before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages created before the specified time.

parameters.description: Only return Landing Pages last updated at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return Landing Pages last updated after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return Landing Pages last updated before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Landing Pages last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Landing Pages. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Landing Pages. Defaults to `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
